name: typescript-mongo-inversify-microservices-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate project for initializing microservices (frontend, backend and authorization gateway). Also let easy editing and adding new miscroservices.

scripts.test:auth: docker exec -it auth-service bash -c "npm run test"
scripts.test:backend: docker exec -it backend bash -c "npm run test"
scripts.test: docker exec -it auth-service bash -c "npm run test" && docker exec -it backend bash -c "npm run test"

author: Adomas Skliutas
